casebody.data:
Folger, Appellant, v. State Farm Mutual Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Folger v. State Farm Mut. Ins. Co. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 149.]

(No. 98-652 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 23, 1998.) *150Altick & Corwin Co., L.P.A., and Thomas M. Baggott, for appellant. Freund, Freeze & Arnold, L.P.A., and Gordon D. Arnold, for appellee.

The discretionary appeal is allowed, the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings on the authority of Ross v. Farmers Ins. Group of Cos. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 281, 695 N.E.2d 732.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
